page.title: 13Transport
page.content: The most amazing recent development is an electrically powered vehicle which has just been mass produced. You can see one in our photograph (D). Strangely they have not proved very popular, perhaps because people are doubtful about their reliability. This Summer has been the wettest for over 100 years and this has not helped sales of the open topped electric car. The motor car is still the most popular form of transport though bicycling is increasingly popular. Heavy lorries destroy the peace and calm of our town as well as damaging buildings by vibration and exhaust fumes. Our railway is underused and the service is poor. The canal is being cleared for lesiure use.
